refsynopsisdiv.title: 呼び出し手順
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: sh = nicholschart(modules) sh = nicholschart(modules, args) sh = nicholschart(modules, args, colors)

varlistentry.listitem:
r実数ベクトル: 位相 (単位: 度). Default values:
-[1 2 5 10 20 30 50 70 90 120 140 160 180]°

vector of 1 or 2 components specifying the colors of the isogain and isophase sets of curves. If a single color is provided, it is used for both gains and phases. colors may be specified either
by indices in the color map.
named colors among the predefined ones.
"#RRGGBB" hexadecimal case-insensitive strings starting with "#", like "#FA7B35".
A 1x3 or 2x3 matrix of [r g b] intensities with 0 <= r,g,b <= 1.

listitem.para:
Structure with 3 fields:
.phaseLines: vector of handles of isophase lines. .phaseLines(i) is the line for args(i).
.gainLines: vector of handles of isogain lines. .gainLines(i) is the line for modules(i).
.gainLabels: vector of handles of isogain labels. .gainLabels(i) is the label for modules(i).

refsection.title: 説明
refsection.para: ニコルス線図をプロット: yの位相/ゲイン平面への y/(1+y)の等モジュールおよび等引数等高線をプロット
nicholschart は,black と組み合わせて使用することができます.
refsection.note: To use the default value of an input argument, just skip it, as in nicholschart(modules,,colors).

refsection.title: 例

revision.revremark: 使用可能な呼び出し手順: nicholschart(gains, phases, colors).

itemizedlist.listitem: The default frames color is now grey85 instead of cyan.
Colors may now be specified by their Scilab names or their "#RRGGBB" hexadecimal code.
